chapter.title: Host Clusters
chapter.para:
The cluster specific elements which may be contained in the cluster description are as follows:
cpu A server CPU reference which defines which CPU type must be supported by all hosts in the cluster. See
data_center A reference to the data center of which this cluster is a member. See
For example:
chapter.screen: <cluster id="0" href="clusters/0"> <name>Default</name> <description>The default server cluster</description> <cpu id="Intel Xeon 45nm Core2"/> <data_center id="d70d5e2d-b8ad-494a-a4d2-c7a5631073c4" href="datacenters/d70d5e2d-b8ad-494a-a4d2-c7a5631073c4"/> </cluster>
chapter.para: When creating a new cluster, the name, cpu id and datacenter id properties are required. Only the name, description and cpu id elements may be updated post-creation.
